properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
[Glory glory to God
Glory in the highest
and peace on earth
to His people of goodwill] x2
[We worship you Almighty Father,
We give you thanks Lord for your glory] x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord God heavenly King, Oh Lord Jesus Christ,
Begotten Son of God, only Son of God.
Lord God and Lamb of God, You take away sins,
The sins of the world, have mercy on us.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For you Lord are seated, at the right hand
Right hand of Mighty God, receive our prayers
Alone are Holy One, Alone the Most High
With the Holy Spirit, Forever Amen.
